entities.name: yuusyou_keiyakuNewtmp_kihonForm
entities.content:
# Verification Form ## 1. Form Settings - **Form Name**: `yuusyou_keiyakuNewtmp_kihonForm` - **Action Mapping**: `/kihonTabDispatch` - **Action Class**: `jp.co.daiwahouse.dsmart.application.contract.yuusyou.keiyakuNewtmp.kihon.KihonTabDispatchAction` - **Validation File**: `src/webapp/dsmart/WEB-INF/config/contract/yuusyou/validation.xml` - **Struts Configuration**: `src/webapp/dsmart/WEB-INF/config/contract/yuusyou/struts-config.xml` ## 2. Field Validation Rules | Screen Block | Label | Property | Validation Rules | Error Message Key | |--------------|------------|----------|------------------|-------------------| | **CH01 Header Screen** | Order Sales Office | `CH01_jyutyuEigyousyoName` | **Required Field**: Required item, empty string not allowed | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.jyutyuEigyousyo`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput` | | | Sales Office | `CH01_uriageEigyousyoName` | **Required Field**: Required item, empty string not allowed | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.uriageEigyousyo`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput` | | | Sales Representative | `CH01_eigyouUserName` | **Required Field**: Required item, empty string not allowed | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.eigyouTantousya`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput` | | | Contract Category | `CH01_keiyakuKbnCd` | **Required Field**: Required item, empty string not allowed | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.keiyakuKubun`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput` | | **Contract Customer Block** | Joint Name Edit | `J0001_keiyakuKokyakuName` | **Maximum Byte Size (200)**: Maximum 200 byte limit
**Non-Half-width Kana**: Only full-width Kana characters allowed | **MaxByteSize**:
• arg0: `＜Contract Party＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.maxByteSize`
• arg1: `200`

**NonHankakuKana**:
• arg0: `＜Contract Party＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | | **Building Owner Block** | Joint Name Edit | `J0002_sesyuKokyakuName` | **Maximum Byte Size (200)**: Maximum 200 byte limit
**Non-Half-width Kana**: Only full-width Kana characters allowed | **MaxByteSize**:
• arg0: `＜Building Owner＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.maxByteSize`
• arg1: `200`

**NonHankakuKana**:
• arg0: `＜Building Owner＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | | **C0001 Construction Name Screen** | Name | `C0001_koujiBukkenName` | **Required Field**: Required item
**Full-width**: Only full-width characters allowed | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.meisyou`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput`

**Zenkaku**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.meisyou`
• message: `common.error.zenkaku` | | | Name Kana | `C0001_koujiBukkenNameKana` | **Required Field**: Required item
**Full-width**: Only full-width characters allowed
**Mask Pattern**: Only characters matching predefined pattern allowed | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.meisyouKana`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput`

**Zenkaku**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.meisyouKana`
• message: `common.error.zenkaku`

**Mask**:
• message: `contract.error.nameKanaCheck` | | **B0031 Contract Conclusion Date** | Contract Conclusion Date | `B0031_keiyakuTeiketsuYoteiDate` | **Required Field**: Required item, date format | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.keiyakuTeiketsuYoteiDate`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput` | | **E0001 Remarks** | Remarks [Remarks Field] | `E0001_memo` | **Maximum Byte Size (600)**: Maximum 600 byte limit
**Non-Half-width Kana**: Only full-width Kana characters allowed | **MaxByteSize**:
• arg0: `Remarks`
• message: `common.error.maxByteSize`
• arg1: `600`

**NonHankakuKana**:
• arg0: `Remarks`
• message: `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | ### 2.1 Message Reference Table #### 2.1.1 Field Name Messages (arg values) | Argument Key | Argument Message | |-------------|----------------| | `contract.common.param.jyutyuEigyousyo` | Order Sales Office | | `contract.common.param.uriageEigyousyo` | Sales Office | | `contract.common.param.eigyouTantousya` | Sales Representative | | `contract.common.param.keiyakuKubun` | Contract Category | | `contract.common.param.meisyou` | Name | | `contract.common.param.meisyouKana` | Name Kana | | `contract.common.param.keiyakuTeiketsuYoteiDate` | Contract Conclusion Date | #### 2.1.2 Validation Error Messages | Message Key | Actual Message | |-------------|----------------| | `contract.error.requiredInput` | {0} must be entered. | | `common.error.zenkaku` | Please enter {0} in full-width characters. | | `common.error.maxByteSize` | Please enter {0} within {1} bytes. (Full-width & line breaks=2 bytes, half-width=1 byte) | | `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | Please enter characters other than half-width Kana for {0}. | | `contract.error.nameKanaCheck` | Please enter full-width Kana, symbols, or numbers for Name Kana. | ## 3. Validation Process Flow ```mermaid graph TD A[Form Submission] --> B[KihonTabDispatchAction] B --> C[Validation.xml Check] C --> D{Required Fields Valid?} D -->|No| E[Display Error Messages] D -->|Yes| F{Format Validation} F -->|No| G[Display Format Errors] F -->|Yes| H[Action Processing] ``` ## 4. JavaScript Validation Functions | No. | Function/Property Name | Error Message | Trigger Condition | |-----|----------------------|---------------|-------------------| | 1 | `cntCheckIntegerPositive()` | "Please enter a positive integer" | Field value is not a positive integer | | 2 | `cntCheckInteger()` | "Please enter an integer" | Field value is not an integer | | 3 | `cntCheckNumber()` | "Please enter a number" | Field value is not a valid number | | 4 | `cntCheckIntegerPositiveRequired()` | "Please enter the required field" | Required field is empty or not a positive integer | | 5 | `cntCheckIntegerRequired()` | "Please enter the required field" | Required field is empty or not an integer | | 6 | `cntCheckNumberRequired()` | "Please enter the required field" | Required field is empty or not a valid number | | 7 | `cntChkGijyutsusyaHaichi()` | "Current construction method application: Please select a target. Please register the technician placement button in the 'Order Information' section" | Current construction method is applied but technician placement button is not registered | | 8 | `cntOutputExcelAlert()` | "New construction product reservation registration is not complete. Please execute the registration and try again" | New construction product reservation registration is not complete | | 9 | `syugouTyumonsyoOutputExcel()` | "Please register at least one order item" | No order items are registered | | 10 | `cntComOpenCustomerTransitionSearch()` | "Customer selection screen is already open. Please close it before executing" | Customer selection screen is already open | | 11 | `cntDoKoujisyuruibui()` | "Construction type and location selection screen is already open. Please close it before executing" | Construction type and location selection screen is already open | | 12 | `cntDoKoujisyuruibuiForYuusyou()` | "Construction type and location selection screen is already open. Please close it before executing" | Construction type and location selection screen is already open (paid version only) |

| `contract.common.param.eigyouTantousya` | Sales Representative |

entities.name: Validation Error Messages
entities.content:
| Message Key | Actual Message |
|-------------|----------------|
| `contract.error.requiredInput` | {0} must be entered. |
| `common.error.zenkaku` | Please enter {0} in full-width characters. |
| `common.error.maxByteSize` | Please enter {0} within {1} bytes. (Full-width & line breaks=2 bytes, half-width=1 byte) |
| `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | Please enter characters other than half-width Kana for {0}. |
| `contract.error.nameKanaCheck` | Please enter full-width Kana, symbols, or numbers for Name Kana. |

entities.name: Validation Process Flow
entities.content:
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Form Submission] --> B[KihonTabDispatchAction]
    B --> C[Validation.xml Check]
    C --> D{Required Fields Valid?}
    D -->|No| E[Display Error Messages]
    D -->|Yes| F{Format Validation}
    F -->|No| G[Display Format Errors]
    F -->|Yes| H[Action Processing]
```

entities.name: JavaScript Validation Functions
entities.content:
| No. | Function/Property Name | Error Message | Trigger Condition |
|-----|----------------------|---------------|-------------------|
| 1 | `cntCheckIntegerPositive()` | "Please enter a positive integer" | Field value is not a positive integer |
| 2 | `cntCheckInteger()` | "Please enter an integer" | Field value is not an integer |
| 3 | `cntCheckNumber()` | "Please enter a number" | Field value is not a valid number |
| 4 | `cntCheckIntegerPositiveRequired()` | "Please enter the required field" | Required field is empty or not a positive integer |
| 5 | `cntCheckIntegerRequired()` | "Please enter the required field" | Required field is empty or not an integer |
| 6 | `cntCheckNumberRequired()` | "Please enter the required field" | Required field is empty or not a valid number |
| 7 | `cntChkGijyutsusyaHaichi()` | "Current construction method application: Please select a target. Please register the technician placement button in the 'Order Information' section" | Current construction method is applied but technician placement button is not registered |
| 8 | `cntOutputExcelAlert()` | "New construction product reservation registration is not complete. Please execute the registration and try again" | New construction product reservation registration is not complete |
| 9 | `syugouTyumonsyoOutputExcel()` | "Please register at least one order item" | No order items are registered |
| 10 | `cntComOpenCustomerTransitionSearch()` | "Customer selection screen is already open. Please close it before executing" | Customer selection screen is already open |
| 11 | `cntDoKoujisyuruibui()` | "Construction type and location selection screen is already open. Please close it before executing" | Construction type and location selection screen is already open |
| 12 | `cntDoKoujisyuruibuiForYuusyou()` | "Construction type and location selection screen is already open. Please close it before executing" | Construction type and location selection screen is already open (paid version only) |
